_source.short_desc: GoCo is Modern HR and Benefits, built for flexibility and ease-of-use. Bring your own benefits & broker, or we'll help you find a fit!
_source.long_desc:
Upgrade your benefits with modern, easy-to-use HR and benefits administration. GoCo is a single solution for enrolling and managing all your company benefit offerings, including: Health, Dental, and Vision; FSA, HSA, HRA; Life, Accident, and Disability; 401k, Commuter Benefits, and more.

And with GoCo, you get the ease and convenience of a modern online enrollment platform, without the hassle of changing carriers or brokers. You can bring your own broker, or we'll help you find a fit!
_source.pricing_details: We believe you shouldn't have to change the way you work (or who you work with) just to use our technology. That's why we build every feature with flexibility and customization in mind. Let us know what apps you need, and we'll build a custom plan to fit your HR workflow. All plans include Onboarding, Employee Self-Service, and MagicDocs. We'll customize the rest to fit your needs!
_source.target_audience: GoCos mission is to help small-to-medium sized businesses spend less time on manual HR tasks, so they can focus on growing happier, more productive teams.

media.caption: Run workflows for your new hires

category_features.name: ACA Reporting
category_features.definition: Collect data and compile reports to stay in compliance with Affordable Care Act requirements

category_features.name: Benefits Administration Outsourcing
category_features.definition: Delegate benefits administration to third party vendors

category_features.name: Benefits Dashboard
category_features.definition: Visualize benefits that employees selected for themselves or that is on offer by an employer

category_features.name: COBRA Administration
category_features.definition: Manage mandated benefit continuation for employees that no longer work for the company but chose to remain on the company plan

category_features.name: Deduction Management
category_features.definition: Determine what amounts employees should contribute towards their benefits from each paycheck

category_features.name: Disability Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage short and/or long term disability insurance benefits

category_features.name: Employee Benefits Administration
category_features.definition: Manage benefit portfolio selection that is available to your employees through workplace and automate related administrative tasks

category_features.name: FMLA Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage benefits mandated by family and medical act

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: HSA/FSA Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage health savings and flexible spending accounts for your employees

category_features.name: Health Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage health insurance benefits for employees

category_features.name: Life Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage life insurance benefits for your employees

category_features.name: Online Benefits Enrollment
category_features.definition: Select benefits and provide information needed to participate in a benefit via an online portal

category_features.name: Provider Management
category_features.definition: Chose benefit providers and track their information, such as rates and contract terms, as well as renewal offerings

category_features.name: Retirement Plan Management
category_features.definition: Set up and manage retirement benefits for your employees

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Applicant Tracking
category_features.definition: Find and manage potential candidates and their applications and resumes through the recruiting life cycle

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Employee Profiles
category_features.definition: Create and view customizable employee profiles to track important information (e.g. job title, manager, contact info, etc.).

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Time Off Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee time-off, vacation, and sick leave requests

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: E-Verify/I-9 Forms
category_features.definition: Verify the identity and employment authorization of individuals hired for employment in the United States

category_features.name: Electronic Forms
category_features.definition: Digital forms that are shared and accessed online

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Employee Handbook
category_features.definition: Create and share a new employee handbook with helpful information

category_features.name: Job Description Management
category_features.definition: Create, share, and manage the distribution of job descriptions/duties

category_features.name: Orientation Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create,assign and specify order of tasks to be completed in order to prepare a new hire for his job role

category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

related_products.short_desc: Gusto is the all-in-one HR platform for growing businesses-one place to hire, pay, insure, and manage your hardworking team.
related_products.features:
Whether you're just getting started or scaling your fast-growing business, Gusto is the partner you need to grow and nurture your team. With Gusto, you get modern HR features like payroll, benefits, hiring, management resources, and more - all in one place. 

Gusto is proud to serve more than 200,000 businesses across the US with a single trusted system, competitive compensation tools, and expert guidance to help you empower your team. Because when your people thrive, your business thrives too.

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR helps manage and organize your employee benefits in one place through Benefits Tracking.
related_products.features: The kinds of benefits you offer can make a big difference in employee retention, and BambooHR helps manage and organize your employee benefits in one place through Benefits Tracking. Employees can see their benefits information right on their BambooHR home screen, letting them find answers to their benefits questions on their own and saving you time. BambooHR helps your employees see and understand how their total compensation fits together

related_products.short_desc: Rippling makes it easy to manage all of your company's benefits in one, online place?medical, dental, vision, FSA, HSA, 401K, and more.
related_products.features: Rippling makes it easy to manage all of your company's benefits in one, online place -- medical, dental, vision, FSA, HSA, 401(k), and more. And unlike other HR systems, Rippling can work with your current broker and plans. That's why Rippling is The #1 Rated Benefits Administration Software, and winner of the 2019 PCMag Editor's Choice Award.

related_products.short_desc: Employee benefits services to support recruiting and keep your team happy.
related_products.features: In today's workplace, the health and safety of employees are a top priority. By integrating payroll with benefits, we make it easy to control costs, simplify administration, and protect what matters most - your people.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: The best plans at the best rates.
related_products.features: Zenefits helps you find the right insurance plans for your employees and your business. You can keep your existing plans, pricing, and carriers, or set up new benefits in minutes. We can help you manage all types of insurance - medical, dental, vision, life & disability, property & casualty, HSA, FSA and more.

related_products.short_desc: The BEST Workforce Management, HR & Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime etc
related_products.features: UKG/Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: Branch enables businesses to accelerate payments to their workforce with our comprehensive workforce payments platform.
related_products.features:
Branch enables businesses to accelerate payments to their workforce with our comprehensive workforce payments platform.

Companies turn to Branch to empower workers with tools like instant payments, free earned wage access, and cashless tips/mileage reimbursements. As part of our platform, workers receive the Branch Wallet: a digital wallet backed by a fee-free checking account, optional debit card, financial wellness tools, and rewards.

related_products.short_desc: Enjoy a streamlined benefits enrollment process for you and your employees, on a single system of record with no data re-entry.
related_products.features: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. Our benefits administration offers 24/7 access to plan information, deduction amounts, enrollment dates and more on a single system.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: At UKG, our purpose is people. Our love for all things HR and workforce management is matched only by our people-centered culture.
related_products.features: UKG Pro delivers unique, culture-driven solutions for midsize to large enterprise companies to support their people through the major and everyday moments they experience while a part of your organization. From paying your people to supporting them, connecting to developing them, and everything in between, UKG Pro is the powerful HCM suite you need to grow and champion meaningful experiences for your people across the globe.

similar_products.short_desc: Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams, where anyone, anywhere can get hired and paid. Instantly hire full-time employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, companies take care of payroll and create localized legal contracts in over 150 countries using a tech-enabled self-serve process.

Deel serves more than 4,500 customers, from SMBs to publicly traded companies.

similar_products.short_desc: Benefit administration and claims processing software for Insurance Companies, Government Plans, TPAs and Self Administered Groups.
similar_products.features: WLT Software is a leader in advanced benefit administration and claims processing software for Insurance Companies, Government Plans, TPAs & Self Administered Groups. Whether administering multiple plans covering millions of lives or one plan covering a small group, our scalable solutions can be tailored to fit your needs. Our systems have two deployment options available; either on site installation or as a hosted solution, making them the most flexible systems available for your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: BambooHR helps manage and organize your employee benefits in one place through Benefits Tracking.
similar_products.features: The kinds of benefits you offer can make a big difference in employee retention, and BambooHR helps manage and organize your employee benefits in one place through Benefits Tracking. Employees can see their benefits information right on their BambooHR home screen, letting them find answers to their benefits questions on their own and saving you time. BambooHR helps your employees see and understand how their total compensation fits together

similar_products.short_desc: Premier benefits administration solution that maximizes value with improved quality and outcomes and lower costs-guaranteed.
similar_products.features: Alight administers benefits through a robust platform, Alight Worklife. Our benefits administration solutions are designed to learn who your people are, what they prefer and help them confidently make smarter decisions for their health and wealth starting when they enroll and continuing throughout the year.

similar_products.short_desc: Corestream enables businesses to provide employee benefits (lifestyle, supplemental) & a GREAT discount program-  1 paycheck deduction.
similar_products.features: Looking to offer in-demand lifestyle and voluntary benefits? Corestream is a leading voluntary benefits software provider that for 15 years has helped employers offer employees benefits like pet insurance, tech protection, group home and auto, critical illness insurance and more.  Corestream is free for employers. Each employee's personalized selection is handled by Corestream and streamlined through payroll deductions so it's hassle-free for employers!

similar_products.short_desc: PlanSource automates and simplifies every aspect of employee benefits management, so HR teams are free to focus on what really matters.
similar_products.features:
PlanSource is a technology company on a mission to create the best benefits experience possible. 

Our end-to-end platform automates and streamlines every aspect of employee benefits management, maximizing the efficiency and overall value of your benefits program. More than 5,000 HR teams, 500 brokers and 7.5 million consumers trust PlanSource for benefits communications, shopping, enrollment, billing, compliance and ongoing administration every day.

similar_products.short_desc: Employee Navigator is a benefits, HR, and compliance software for brokers and their clients.
similar_products.features: Employee Navigator is a benefits, HR, and compliance software for brokers and their clients.  With Employee Navigator, brokers can now offer their clients a single solution to manage everything from benefits administration to onboarding and PTO.  Best of all, because the system is self-service, we were able to lower the costs of the technology by over 90%, putting first class technology in the hands of every broker and employer in the United States.

similar_products.short_desc: A disruptive employee engagement platform that seeks to enhance employee engagement and productivity with industry leading tools.
similar_products.features: Advantage Club is a global employee engagement platform that seeks to enhance employee experience by providing employees with tools aimed at fostering an appreciative and emotionally healthy workplace culture. The platform offers services such as rewards, recognition, employee communities and solutions aimed at financial well-being, all on a single platform. Established in 2016, we are currently live in 100+ countries, with 1000+ corporate clients and offers services from 10,000+ brand partners.

similar_products.short_desc: Questis transforms businesses by helping employees solve the root causes of financial stress with technology and one-on-one coaching.
similar_products.features: Questis is a workforce financial empowerment company providing a complete personal finance solution that benefits people and employers. We help businesses become life-changing employers by helping employees solve the root causes of financial stress. Our innovative solution meets people at the paycheck with solid behavioral science, personalized, predictive planning, real-person coaching, and a modern, friendly user experience. Learn more at questis.co.

similar_products.short_desc: Entice and retain global talent by offering the most competitive benefits package and perks tailored to their country.
similar_products.features: Remote understands that different people value different things, so we offer customized benefits packages tailored to fit each country. We empower companies to provide world-class benefits and perks that not only comply with local laws but also meet employees' high standards. From paid time off and holidays to health care and life insurance, easy benefits administration is just one part of the Remote platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Health Portal Solutions organizes Healthcare Payers' data, vendors, and business processes behind one login.
similar_products.features:
Healthcare Payers struggle to manage the moving parts of health plan administration. We help Payers organize their data, vendors, and business processes behind one login so they can efficiently manage the different pieces of healthcare in one place.

For more than 20 years, Healthcare Payers worldwide have achieved greater efficiencies and greater marketability through their partnership with Health Portal Solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: We provide benefits management for a global workforce. Our in-house experts guide you through the maze of benefits in 160+ countries
similar_products.features: Benefits are a powerful tool to build brand awareness around the message of employee empowerment. When they reflect the true values of the company, prospective employees gain a sense of belonging. Papaya provides benefits management for a global workforce. Our in-house experts guide you through the maze of benefits in over 160 countries, help you figure out what is possible, and connect you with local benefits vendors. Medical coverage is provided on a customized global policy.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Claims Processing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Claims Processing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Claims Processing software automates insurance claims management, electronic submissions, and collections. These applications offer a full feature suite of efficient claims processing management tools along with integrated accounting and customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. Claims Processing software offers real-time processing and reporting on the administrative and revenue generation activities for insurance industry firms, employee health plans and benefit managers. They cater to a variety of product sectors including life, health, automotive, COBRA, workers compensation, employer liability and others. Claims Processing software is related to Insurance Policy software and Medical Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Corporate Wellness software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Corporate Wellness tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Corporate Wellness software helps companies with establishing and managing health improvement programs for their employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Communication Tools on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Communication tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Communication Tools allow HR and executive teams to interact, collaborate, and share knowledge, updates, and alerts with the rest of the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Engagement software aims to assist managers with maintaining employee awareness of corporate culture and increasing their level of investment in the company. Employee surveys, gamification tools, team sentiment analytics, and applications that streamline communication are all represented.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Online Punch Card
category_features.definition: Employees can punch in or out on the internet

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Punch card
category_features.definition: Clock in and out by placing a card into a machine.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Salaried Employee Tracking
category_features.definition: Record salaried employee worked time periods

category_features.name: Sick Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and manage sick leave time

category_features.name: Timesheet Management
category_features.definition: The ability to create, edit, and manage timesheets for hourly employees for shifts worked

category_features.name: Vacation/Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Request, track, and manage time off requests and vacation time

category_features.name: Workstation Tracking
category_features.definition: Record and track tasks and employees at a workstation

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is a proud part of the QuickBooks family, seamlessly connecting with leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, ADP and more. Easily manage people, projects and payroll, all in one place

related_products.short_desc: Simply clock in and clock out using a timer, fill timesheets, track attendance, and use data for payroll and billing with Clockify.
related_products.features: Clockify is a time clock software that lets you track time spent on activities. You can create and edit time entries manually, track time by using a stopwatch, and generate personalized reports. Boost your time management skills with an integrated Pomodoro timer - customize it to work for your schedule. There is GPS clocking and location tracking available for remote field teams. Clockify monitors time from anywhere - web, desktop, mobile - all data is synced online.

related_products.short_desc: Leading cloud based time clock software for small and big teams. Easy to use, with great reports, multi-device and offline support.
related_products.features: Leading cloud-based time clock software for small and big teams. Simple, flexible tool for tracking work hours, with multi-platform support. Generates beautiful reports and time usage graphs with an option to export time logs as Excel spreadsheets, get weekly reports via email or share public reports links with clients to provide more transparency. Available as a web app, desktop apps for Windows and Mac, mobile apps for iOS and Android, and a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

related_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
related_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce.

related_products.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile time clock & GPS tracking software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
related_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile time clock and GPS tracking software built for construction, field service and contractors that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 7,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling fully automates time tracking from check-in to paycheck. No manual entries, syncing issues or late approvals from supervisors.
related_products.features: With Rippling, employees can easily clock in and out using our mobile app, a tablet kiosk, or computer?and features like geolocation restrictions, QR codes, and selfie check-ins, help prevent buddy punching and off-site clock-ins. When employees clock-in, their approved hours instantly and accurately sync with your payroll system.

related_products.short_desc: See work happen in real-time with Hubstaff's time clock software and identify productivity trends. Start a free trial today!
related_products.features: Avoid inefficiency for time clock and work better with streamlined time tracking software from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage invoicing, reporting, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Trello, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, and iOS.

related_products.short_desc: Flexible time clocks and mobile apps to fit Your business.
related_products.features: Start tracking time worked more accurately and efficiently with a range of Paychex time collection options. No matter what method you pick, rest assured that our systems fully integrate with Paychex Flex? Time, our intuitive, cloud-based time and attendance solution that supports businesses of all sizes and many types of working environments.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, time tracking, and communication tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!
related_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants improve efficiency with intuitive scheduling, time tracking, communication, and compliance tools. The intuitive 7punches app integrates right into your schedule to manage time and attendance, reduce compliance risks, and improve employee accountability. The easy drag-and-drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. Start free today!

related_products.short_desc:
Track time on any device (computer, tablet, phones, or POS system). 
Easily compile hours, correct errors, and prepare to run payroll.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

No matter what method you pick, rest assured that our systems fully integrate with Paychex Flex? Time, our intuitive, cloud-based time and attendance solution that supports businesses of all sizes and many types of working environments.

similar_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile time clock and GPS tracking software built for construction, field service and contractors that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 7,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy.

similar_products.short_desc: Synerion's time and scheduling suite of solutions will provide you with everything you need to track, monitor and manage employees.
similar_products.features: Synerion is a world leader in time clocks and integrated software with over 35 years of experience, 5,000,000 users, and 7,000 installations globally. Synerion offers many options such as mobile devices, GPS tracking, finger/hand biometric devices, tablet clocks with face detection and more we also integrate to over 100 different systems including the most popular payroll systems. In addition to time clocks we offer time and advanced scheduling solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline time capture with Replicon's touchless CloudClock, face ID, voice recognition, GPS tracking, and intelligent approvals.
similar_products.features: Time is universal in every business. You don?t want your leaders spending effort figuring out if the data is right.  Know your data is accurate & reliable & use the time to make strategic decisions. Keep everyone on the same page by streamlining the approval process with real-time alerts, notifications, & more for enhanced performance & profitability. Flexible timesheet formats allow businesses to build custom timesheets, & dynamic approval workflows can be modeled to ensure labor compliance.

similar_products.short_desc:
Track time on any device (computer, tablet, phones, or POS system). 
Easily compile hours, correct errors, and prepare to run payroll.
similar_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
similar_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily track & manage employee work hours with an easy-to-use employee time clock app, designed especially for mobile employees.
similar_products.features: Bring simplicity and accuracy to your employee attendance tracking and work hours management, with GPS location tracking, time off approvals, flexible overtime and breaks preferences, customizable timesheets export, and direct integration with payroll software such as Quickbooks Online & Gusto. Easily track and manage work hours on jobs and projects, schedule jobs, chat with out-of-office employees, share updates & attachments, and so much more in an all-in-one employee management app.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud based time clock solution that pre-populates reports for payroll. Employees can punch in on their desktop or mobile devices.
similar_products.features: Punching in and out with our time clock software is intuitive for your employees and it's easy for managers to view and export time. Employees can clock in using a browser, iOS or Android app. View who's on the clock, including their GPS position. Advanced features such as PTO Accrual Tracking, Punch Rounding, Job Codes, QR Codes, Automatic Breaks, and SSO are all included in our cloud based time clock solution.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: A touchscreen time clock that can be configured with extensions to meet your exact needs as well as a mobile app for clock operations.
similar_products.features:
We offer multiple device options for employee-facing operations. 
Our industry-leading touchless, biometric and thermal sensor devices provide access control and give your employees the ability to complete self-service functions. Additionally, our MobileClock mobile app allows employees to use their phones as a safe single-user device for all their operations from clocking in/out to inputting requests.

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, time tracking, and communication tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!
similar_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants improve efficiency with intuitive scheduling, time tracking, communication, and compliance tools. The intuitive 7punches app integrates right into your schedule to manage time and attendance, reduce compliance risks, and improve employee accountability. The easy drag-and-drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. Start free today!

similar_products.short_desc: uAttend was built for businesses that need an easy-to-use, affordable, and reliable time and attendance system.
similar_products.features: uAttend integrates easy-to-use cloud software with its time clocks to provide businesses efficient, accurate, and streamlined time and attendance tracking. Every uAttend time clock is cloud-connected and supports a variety of punch options including fingerprint, voice control, PIN, RFID, mobile app, and web. Alternatively, the uAttend cloud can be used on its own to provide the same automation without a time clock.

similar_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
similar_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Attendance Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Attendance Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Attendance Tracking software helps organizations manage the whereabouts of their employees. These applications track an employee's vacation time off, sick time off, overtime, and absences. The software also searches for patterns in absences. Attendance Tracking software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Time Clock software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.description: Leave Management System allows organizations to manage employee time-off, setup leave policies, and automate leave requests approval.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
